functions.tag: {CustomModelData:68,display:{Name:'{"translate":"光の杖","color":"#DBD4A6","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"#DBD4A6","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(II)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"光の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"汎用的な杖に光の欠片を取り付けたもの。","color":"#A49F7D","italic":false}','{"translate":"誰でも魔法を扱えるようになっているが、","color":"#A49F7D","italic":false}','{"translate":"数回使用すると壊れてしまう。","color":"#A49F7D","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"C","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" 煌乱の記録"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"光",Tier:2},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"共通",Name:"煌乱の記録",Level:1,Interval:0,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:128},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.08d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,31],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:8d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-2.4d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
